name: EverCore (RoKell)
description:
• Title: EverCore
  • Controls:
    • WASD - P1 Movement
    • Up, Down - P2 Movement
    • 4 - P2 Fire
    • Space - P1 Jump
    • P - Start game at title screen
    • Esc - Exit game at title screen
  • Goal: Work together to reach the end of the train cars!
  • My Contribution:
    • In this project I mainly focused on the programming. The main concept I learned throughout this project is the use of a raycast to detect a collision. In this particular instance the player 2 reticle fires a ray from the center of its box towards the background of the game. This allowed for the detection of if the reticle was over a drone and allowed for its destruction condition.
